ques: The situation requires _________ attention; we can't delay any longer.
The view from the mountaintop was absolutely _________.
His _________ idea turned out to be a brilliant invention.
The _________ sea made the boat ride uncomfortable.
The chef's _________ culinary skills earned him a Michelin star.
The elephant was _________, towering over the other animals.
The _________ cloth was used to wipe the spill.
The room was _________, with no furniture or decorations.
The doctor delivered the _________ news about her condition.
The _________ windstorm knocked down trees and power lines.
She gave a _________ explanation of the concept during the presentation.
She had a _________ feeling that someone was watching her.
His behavior is _________ of a teenager going through adolescence.
The _________ cost of the project exceeded our budget.
She has a _________ passion for extreme sports.
The _________ weather made everything feel chilly.
He had a _________ experience during his backpacking trip.
His performance in the game was _________; he scored five goals.
The court made a _________ decision in favor of the plaintiff.
The lion's _________ roar could be heard from a distance.
The contract was finalized with a _________ agreement between the parties.
I want to know the _________ time of arrival for the flight.
The doctor received an _________ call and rushed to the hospital.
He had to walk on _________ feet through the hot sand.
They made a _________ profit from the sale of their company.
He is known for his _________ approach to his work.
The _________ noise in the night kept her awake.
The _________ weather in this region is hot and humid.
She sent an _________ message to her colleagues about the meeting time change.
The tree branches were _________ of leaves in the winter.
His behavior was _________ and unpredictable.
His _________ skills in debate competitions earned him awards.
The _________ texture of the fabric irritated her skin.
The chef prepared a _________ meal that delighted the guests.
The _________ roller coaster ride left us screaming with excitement.
The consequences of the mistake were _________ and costly.
The concert attracted a _________ crowd of music enthusiasts.
The competition for the championship was _________ and intense.
Her _________ presence at the event surprised everyone.
She achieved _________ success in her field of expertise.
The _________ workday for most people starts at 9 a.m.
The basement had a _________ and musty smell.
The house had a _________ backyard with a swimming pool.
The _________ object in the sky puzzled astronomers.
The movie we watched last night was truly _________; it had amazing special effects.
The mountain peak offered _________ views of the surrounding landscape.
The _________ draft in the room made it cold.
Her _________ honesty in the situation was admirable.
The company faced an _________ crisis that needed immediate action.
She showed a _________ determination to succeed.
She felt a _________ sensation on her skin after swimming.
The _________ response to that question is 'yes.'
The _________ exchange of ideas at the meeting was productive.
The _________ results of the experiment were unexpected.
It's _________ how fast time flies when you're having fun.
She had a _________ conversation with her boss about her career goals.
He received a _________ warning from his teacher for disruptive behavior.
He gave an _________ account of what happened.
It's _________ how things can change so quickly.
Their _________ behavior at the party was entertaining.
The _________ battle lasted for hours.
The project required a _________ amount of time and resources.
Their _________ playstyle in the game led to victory.
The government is taking _________ measures to address the crisis.
His _________ plea for help was heard by the rescue team.
The ground was _________ after the rain shower.
The president holds _________ authority in the country.
She had a _________ adventure while traveling in a foreign country.
It's _________ to see traffic jams during rush hour.
They lived in a _________ cabin in the woods.
